text: @FoxNews My question: @realDonaldTrump, are you aware that you were correct about UV-light potentially treating coronavirus? Cedars-Sinai in Los Angeles along with Aytu Bioscience are developing a device called Healight, which can kill coronavirus with UV-A light therapy.
